name: Binance Basic Trade Dark Theme
description: This is a night mode theme for the basic trading page on binance.com, designed to be easy on the eyes for night traders and have better spacing. This only applies to the basic trading page, everything else will be left as is. Feedback always welcome. Binance is the one of the best exchanges for trading cryptocurrencies, You can visit the site here to start trading. Like it? buy me a beer or two: BTC: 15WptmgmALYxsrXDWgsmadL6mA1ELGGy56 ETH: 0xd069E9F04e8612B494D894A749Ef305854DbfcA0 LTC: LP4WdbQgPSZAtXwZ7onx6PszPZ7oD3nN1Q Thanks and enjoy it.
